column1: Dataganj is a town and a nagar palika in Badaun district  in the state of Uttar Pradesh
column2: India.Dataganj city acts as a junction for many roads leading to Budaun (27 km)
column4: Miyaun (26 km) and Bela Dandi (7 km).

column3: 672. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Dataganj has an average literacy rate of 50%
column4: lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 57% and
column6: 20% of the population is under 6 years of age.
